parameter.description: Probability of event below lower limit
Probability of event above upper limit
Probability of event between upper and lower limits (the range includes lower limit but no the upper limit)
Probability of event above lower limit
Probability of event below upper limit
Probability of event equal to lower limit
Probability of event in above normal category (see Notes 1 and 2)
Probability of event in near normal category (see Notes 1 and 2)
Probability of event in below normal category (see Notes 1 and 2)
